title: Emmys 2019: See what the stars wore on the red carpet
text:
On Emmys night, it’s just as much fun to see what everyone is wearing as it is to find out which stars and shows snag awards.

The red carpet — which is actually purple this year — is the place where TV stars show off their fanciest ensembles, usually elaborate, custom creations from top designers.

This year, people are already buzzing about Orange Is the New Black star Dascha Polanco’s Christian Siriano-designed gown featuring oversized pink bows. They called it “prom inspired” and said she looked “utterly phenomenal.”

Take a look at what everyone wore, vote each look up or down and enjoy the (fashion) show.

description: On Emmys night, it’s just as much fun to see what everyone is wearing as it is to find out which stars and shows snag awards.
